commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
[DISCORD]
# Configuración del bot de Discord
BOT_TOKEN = your_bot_token_here
WEBHOOK_URL = your_webhook_url_here
COMMAND_PREFIX = !
ADMIN_ROLE_ID = 123456789
NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL_ID = 123456789
ERROR_CHANNEL_ID = 123456789
LOG_CHANNEL_ID = 123456789

[COMMANDS]
# Configuración de comandos permitidos
ALLOW_SYSTEM_COMMANDS = true
ALLOW_FILE_OPERATIONS = true
ALLOW_NETWORK_COMMANDS = true
ALLOW_PROCESS_MANAGEMENT = true
MAX_COMMAND_LENGTH = 1000

[NOTIFICATIONS]
# Configuración de notificaciones
NOTIFY_ON_BOT_CONNECT = true
NOTIFY_ON_BOT_DISCONNECT = true
NOTIFY_ON_ERROR = true
NOTIFY_ON_COMMAND = true
EMBED_COLOR_SUCCESS = 3066993
EMBED_COLOR_ERROR = 15158332
EMBED_COLOR_INFO = 3447003

[RATE_LIMITING]
# Configuración de límites de uso
COMMANDS_PER_MINUTE = 10
MESSAGES_PER_MINUTE = 30
COOLDOWN_DURATION = 60

[LOGGING]
# Configuración de logs del bot
LOG_LEVEL = INFO
LOG_FORMAT = %%(asctime)s - %%(levelname)s - %%(message)s
LOG_FILE = logs/discord_bot.log
ENABLE_DEBUG = false

[SECURITY]
# Configuración de seguridad del bot
ALLOWED_GUILDS = 123456789,987654321
BLOCKED_USERS = 11111111,22222222
REQUIRED_PERMISSIONS = 8
COMMAND_TIMEOUT = 30
